pageProduct.name: Sukin For Men Beard Oil 50ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

With Argan & Crambe Oils To Soothe, Soften And Hydrate For A More Manageable Beard.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Use To Strengthen And Hydrate Beard

Ingredients

Ingredients: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil Phytosterol Esters, Coconut Alkanes, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan), Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Linalool**.

Directions

Application: After Cleansing, Gently Massage A Small Amount Into Face And Neck. Use Once Or Twice Daily.?
